survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Tutoring Platforms
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online tutoring platforms to evaluate their satisfaction, identify areas for improvement, and understand user preferences.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online tutoring platforms?
questions.client_notes: Recommended scale: Frequency-based options to gauge engagement levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use online tutoring platforms?

questions.question_text: Which of the following online tutoring platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for open-ended responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection and include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following online tutoring platforms have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online tutoring platforms?
questions.client_notes: Include an open-text field for 'Other' to capture additional reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection and include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online tutoring platforms?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring provided? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring provided? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online tutoring platform you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text box for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online tutoring platform you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online tutoring platform you use to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a numerical scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online tutoring platform you use to others? (1 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
